item.title: Mentioned by Hamilton Spectator
item.description:
New critic jobs for Hamilton MPs Charlton, Marston
New critic jobs for Hamilton MPs Charlton, Marston. Hamilton Spectator. Two local New Democrat MPs have got new jobs in a shuffle of the federal shadow cabinet by leader Thomas Mulcair. Hamilton Mountain MP Chris Charlton is now the industry critic.
